div.bibl: Proletarec, Vol. 4, No. 105, Sept. 14, 1909. AIM OF THE SLOVENIAN SOCIALIST ORGANIZATION IN AMERICA

body.p: The principal aim of the Slovenian Socialist Organization in America is to organize all Slovenian workers into an International Socialist Party for the defense and interests of the working class, with no objection to religion or race; also to work on a wide distribution of workersâ€˜ literature and newspapers; to organize public lectures, meetings, etc.; also to advocate and help our workers become citizens of this country and enjoy the full rights of citizens; and help members with moral and financial support in case of need.
